channel.title: 2019 Artist (re)Introductions
channel.description:
2019 is fast upon us, so I'd like to take a quick minute to throw this out to you guys. There are some familiar faces, and some new ones! Any information you're not comfortable sharing - no worries, leave it blank! This is your chance to introduce yourself, share whatever information you'd like and showcase some of your work - in addition to laying out your goals for 2019. Go wild! If you highlight everything from the picture down you can hit reply and use it as a template for your own submission, just a heads up. Quoting the whole post would also work here. Here's to a productive 2019!!
> ![download|259x194](https://global.discourse-cdn.com/standard10/uploads/auxy/original/2X/b/bfad3be4b22558489f7b0935c34a8f7ce4bd6a79.png) > **Name (or producer name):** > **Other / Historical Names:** None. > **Country of residence:** xxxxxxxxx > **Age (optional):** > **Gender (optional):** > **Preferred Genre(s) for creating tracks:** > **Preferred Genre(s) for listening to:** > **My best tracks (3 max):** > **Most commonly used Auxy sounds or sound packs?** > **Did I achieve my musical goals for 2018?** > **Musical goals for 2019:** > **Fav music related websites:** > **One thing you would like to see in a 2019 sound pack?**
> **Online presence:** > > > > * **Soundcloud:** > * **Instagram:** > * **Twitter:** > * **Discord:** > * **Youtube:** > * **Snapchat:** > * **Spotify:** > * **Website(s):** > * **Facebook:** > * **[Other]:**

item.description:
Name (or producer name): Grayson (Dadmother)
Other / Historical Names: Daddy
Country of residence: USA
Age (optional): 28
Gender (optional): Alien
Preferred Genre(s) for creating tracks: No general preference, just whatever comes to mind (I think I may be the only one that regularly makes metal-oriented music in Auxy???)
Preferred Genre(s) for listening to: Too many to list, but I love ambient, metal/hardcore, synthwave
My best tracks (3 max):
All of them suck
Most commonly used Auxy sounds or sound packs? I use Morning from the original pack alllll the time. Various drum kits. Game Waves. Idk a lot of different sounds.
Did I achieve my musical goals for 2018? I made a lot of music, so I suppose I did.
Musical goals for 2019: Release a concept album/EP, increase exposure, give y’all more digital hugs
Fav music related websites: Auxy Disco, Sophie’s Floorboard, Bandcamp

Ok.
Glacial snares, tons of Hip Hop sample packs, clap 08 of the trap soundpack, radiant, barber, silk, jelly, kilobyte, boom basses, acoustic guitars, 7 skies collection. Lots more.

Two albums? Check. Creating a rap duo? Check. Getting a repost by Auxy? Heh, not yet

Make an alternate version of my debut album, making two EPs of two different styles of music simultaneously

I don’t know, I would use anything that sounds good.
